#include <iostream>
#include <algorithm>

using namespace std;

int Z[1000006];

int main() {
	// your code goes here
	string s;
	int n;
	cin >> n;
	int k;
	cin >> s >> k;
	int L, R;
	L = R = 0;
	Z[0] = n;
	for(int i = 1; i < s.size(); i++) {
		if(i <= R) {
			int k = i-L;
			if(Z[k] >= R-i+1) {
				L = i;
				while(R < s.size() && s[R] == s[R-L]) {
					R++;
				}
				Z[i] = R-L;
				R--;
			}
			else {
				Z[i] = Z[k];
			}
		}
		else {
			L = R = i;
			while(R < s.size() && s[R] == s[R-L]) R++;
			Z[i] = R-L;
			R--;
		}
	}

	sort(Z, Z+s.size());
	reverse(Z, Z+s.size());
	int cc = 1;
	cout << Z[k-1] << endl;
	for(int i = 0; i < Z[k-1]; i++) {
		cout << s[i];
	}
	cout << endl;
	return 0;
}
